actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to require the submission to Congress of research proposals prior to the expenditure of Federal funds.

summary.text: Prohibits any department or agency of the Federal Government from entering into any contract, making any grant for the performance of research, until after 30 days from the date upon which a prospectus concerning such research is submitted to the appropriate committee or committees of Congress. Stipulates that the provisions of this Act shall not apply where the sum of Federal funds involved is less than $25,000.

titles.title: A bill to require the submission to Congress of research proposals prior to the expenditure of Federal funds.
